title: Video: Shinies – Ennui (Feat. Pat Sharp)
content:
Remember Pat Sharp? Of course you do.

Who could forget that gorgeous hair? Now into his fifties (well, fifty precisely), the former Fun House presenter and Radio 1 DJ appears to have taken a liking to the gritty shoegaze of our Manchester via Newcastle friends Shinies, starring in their new video for recent single Ennui. A bizarre and at times rather gruesome affair, it’s very much tongue in cheek, recalling the hazy nostalgia of youth in a twisted light, that ultimately ends in, well, I’ll let you find out for yourself. Check it out below and pre-order the single here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
